articles.headline: In Europe, Stagnation as a Way of Life
articles.snippet: The Greek debt deal opens the door to new uncertainties in Europe, which could once again revive the crisis atmosphere.
articles.abstract: The Greek debt deal opens the door to new uncertainties in Europe, which could once again revive the crisis atmosphere.
articles.lead_paragraph: PARIS — For all the struggles that Greece has gone through to satisfy its demanding lenders, Europe’s troubles are not going away.
articles.byline: By Liz Alderman and Landon Thomas Jr

articles.headline: Banks Come First in a Greek Rescue Plan
articles.snippet: A proposed financial rescue package for Greece calls for debt payments as the first priority, whatever happens to Greece itself.
articles.abstract: A proposed financial rescue package for Greece calls for debt payments as the first priority, whatever happens to Greece itself.
articles.lead_paragraph: It now appears that Europe is prepared to pay what it needs to pay to save its banks.

articles.headline: 417.6 Million Bites Later ...
articles.snippet: A 2007 video of a boy chomping on the finger of his brother has been viewed 417.6 million times, making it the most successful noncommercial video in YouTube history.
articles.abstract: A 2007 video of a boy chomping on the finger of his brother has been viewed 417.6 million times, making it the most successful noncommercial video in YouTube history.
articles.lead_paragraph: MAIDENHEAD, England — Visiting the local park not long ago, Shelley Davies-Carr and her four sons were suddenly surrounded by a gaggle of overexcited teenagers wielding cellphones and taking photographs. “Oh, my God!” the teenagers shrieked, as only teenagers can. “ ‘Charlie Bit My Finger!’ ”

articles.headline: Santorum Adjusting to Star Treatment on Trail
articles.snippet: Though overtaking Mitt Romney is still a formidable challenge, Rick Santorum is carrying himself as a front-runner.
articles.abstract: Though overtaking Mitt Romney is still a formidable challenge, Rick Santorum is carrying himself as a front-runner.
articles.lead_paragraph: PLANO, Tex. — A crowd of well-wishers and autograph-seekers surrounded Rick Santorum at an event hall here this week. The place was packed; dozens of men, women and children stranded outside stood in the cold just to catch a glimpse of him.

articles.headline: Bishops Were Prepared for Battle Over Birth Control Coverage
articles.snippet: Roman Catholic bishops began mobilizing months ago for a major campaign against a requirement that religious-affiliated institutions cover birth control in their insurance plans.
articles.abstract: Roman Catholic bishops began mobilizing months ago for a major campaign against a requirement that religious-affiliated institutions cover birth control in their insurance plans.
articles.lead_paragraph: When after much internal debate the Obama administration finally announced its decision to require religiously affiliated hospitals and universities to cover birth control in their insurance plans, the nation’s Roman Catholic bishops were fully prepared for battle.
